item.title: About This Blog
item.description: Hi! I’m Bryan Tan, a first-year Computing major at UC Santa Barbara with a love for computer science and technology. In particular, I enjoy writing and refining code to be as elegant as possible. Check out my posts to get a glimpse of what I like to do! This blog was generated using Hugo and uses the nofancy theme by Zack Guo. Except otherwise noted, (1) the articles are licensed under a CC-BY 4.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Obligatory hello world post. I’m setting up a blog again , but this time, I’m planning on actually posting stuff! This time, the goal is to improve my writing skills; though my grammar is quite good, I’m terrible at writing anything other than directions, code, or technical explanations (though I’ll probably end up spending most of my time on these types of writing). In particular, I have a really hard time putting essays together.
